text:
Jacques Bravo (29 December 1943 – 18 December 2019) was a French politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party. From 2001 through 2014, he was the Mayor of the 9th arrondissement of Paris. From 1995 through 2014, he was the Councillor of Paris.
Bravo was born in Valognes, France. He died on 18 December 2019 in Paris at the age of 75.
